name: Use The Force
Lore: '''Use the Force. Yes... Now, the stone. Feel it.',
Text: 'Choose up to X of the following in any order, where X = the number of cards stacked on Communing: peek at the top card of any deck or pile: may then shuffle it. OR draw 2 cards from reserve deck. OR retrieve 1 force. OR activate X force. OR your next destiny draw is + X.',
